# Hell Ripte
Hell Ripte, is a [textlink="martial art" link="MartialArts"] that focuses on ripping through crowds of demons with brutal efficiency. This art can only be mastered by the slaughter demons of hell, as it requires an enormous amount of raw strength and power to master. A full understanding of this art will allow you to paint the station red. None will be safe from your carnage.
## Special abilities
Hell Ripte masters do extreme amounts of damage in short windows, making them unmatched in hand to hand combat.
## Combo attacks
### Tear Down
Deals massive slashing damage and bleeds the target.
### Head Rip
Rip off the head of an opponent who is dead, very lethal. Cannot be done while target is alive.
### Hellish Slam
Knocks an opponent down and deals heavy stamina damage. If you are downed you pull yourself up.
### Drop Kick
Launch a downed opponent. Great for painting. Cannot be done while on the ground.
